channel.title: Anybody wants to make a server?
channel.description:
Title basically says it all. Its been a few months since I've owned a server. Now I feel that I want to run my own rsps with somebody, but I need a coder. I will provide a: -Good Forums -Host it(until we get a vps) -Advertise(make videos, tell my friends, and make adv threads)
If you want to make a rsps with me, I need you to add the following ranks for in game because I can easily get people to donate, so I need the following ranks added into the source; -reg donor -super donor -extreme donor
Also, It can be either eco or spawn, but I really prefer a spawn server.
If interested, shoot me a pm.

I’d like to help, contact me through skype: L2Mage.Kids

item.title: Anybody wants to make a server?
item.dc:creator: @Gabe12 Gabe12
item.description:
@Gabe12 wrote:

JavaLearner:

Spawn server? Well can I ask, what will that bring you to pay for the VPS and stuff if people can just spawn their items? You’ll need some kind of system for people to pay or else you’ll be bankrupt pretty soon.

Umm, Make rares,nex armours, and etc etc unspawnable…? Maybe dicing can be added and they can dice there rares which will be more fun. They will need to donate for the rares and what not. All I said it can be either or, just preferred a spawn.

Read full topic
item.source: Anybody wants to make a server?

item.title: Anybody wants to make a server?
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

You should provide more information on the base you plan to use, how you want the spawn server to run etc. All a programmer can gather from this is :
“I will host, advertise, and manage I just need a lackey to do the programming”

Read full topic
